friday.title: Xana ndzi nga ku pfuna hi yini?
friday.welcome: Mi amukeriwile eka Ravuntlhanu, mupfuni wa n'wina wa AI-powered!
friday.prompt: Ndzi vutise xin’wana ni xin’wana kutani u sungula ntirho lowuntshwa.
friday.help: U lava mpfuneto? Ndzi laha ku ta ku kongomisa.

stats.automation-runs: Ku tsutsuma hi ku tirhisa michini .

automations.pause: Ku yimanyana ku tirha hi ku tirhisa michini .
automations.stop: Yima ku tirhisa xitirhisiwa xa otomatiki .

errors.generic: Xin’wana xi fambe kahle. Hi kombela mi ringeta nakambe.
errors.unauthorized: A wu pfumeleriwanga ku endla goza leri.
errors.invalid-input: Hi kombela u languta input ya wena u ringeta nakambe.
errors.network: Xihoxo xa netiweke. Hi kombela u languta vuhlanganisi bya wena.

tooltips.new-project: Sungula phurojeke leyintshwa yo hlela mintirho ya wena.
tooltips.automation-run: Tirhisa otomatiki leyi ku endla mintirho leyi hlamuseriweke ka ha ri emahlweni.
tooltips.library-search: Ku lavisisa tithempleyiti, switshuriwa, kumbe tidathasete.
tooltips.space-invite: Rhamba swirho swa ntlawa ku tirhisana eka xivandla lexi.
